title: Curriculum Vitae
text: Click here to download a PDF copy of my curriculum vitae .

title: Raphael Morsomme
text:
When not creating new MCMC samplers, I enjoy playing tennis, model making and cooking. I am also a fan of Formula 1.
Email me at raphael.morsomme@duke.edu.

title: Academic Research
text: My academic interests revolves around the development of more efficient sampling algorithms for problems with high-dimensional missing data. I have focused on stochastic epidemic models and breast cancer evolution models for which I have developed efficient block Metropolis-Hastings samplers to explore the latent space.

title: Academic Research
